'''"Tagged and Bagged"''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Bulle Sauce Duck Breast]] with [[Clorinde]]. The [[recipe]] for  Bulle Sauce Duck Breast is obtainable from [[Sanguinetti]] for {{Item|Mora|x=2,250}}.
